creator: Nivagia
descriptionHtml:
Thank you for playing the alpha version of Chest Chaser.
You are great!

Feel free to email me with helpful feedback. I try to answer all emails and I'm sorry if it takes me a little time, as I'm a solo indie developer.

The player battles in a dungeon and has to pass through various rooms, in which there are enemies of different types. By defeating enemies, the player receives diamonds that can be exchanged for upgrades during the game in order to fight the final boss in the last room.
By defeating the final boss, the player receives a loot box containing coins, gems and other surprises. For an awesome surprise effect, random negative or positive effects occur every 30 seconds, affecting the gameplay.

The player can be moved with the help of a virtual joystick; aiming at and attacking the opponents is done automatically while moving.

Please note that your progress may be reset after the alpha phase.
descriptionShort: Chest Chaser is a casual action dungeon crawler game, with rougelike elements

By defeating the final boss, the player receives a loot box containing coins, gems and other surprises. For an awesome surprise effect, random negative or positive effects occur every 30 seconds, affecting the gameplay.

descriptionShort: A fun & casual autofire hero rpg, with dungeon crawler & roguelike elements

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Changed icons and background images
- Fixed a bug where you could generate infinite chests
- Fixed some overlays in battle that were displayed above the character outlines
- Fixed a wrong number that was shown in the roulette reward after watching an advertisement
- Ad buttons are now green
- Less spikes in level 3 -4
- Less enemies in backyard level 1 and 2

title: Chest Chaser: Dungeon Hero

creator: Nivagia
descriptionHtml:
Welcome Chaser!

Compete in levels with enemies that will make your search for chests and loot difficult.
As one of many auto-shooting chasers, you will face hordes of different enemies.
Search and collect many incredible chasers and fight in breathtaking dungeons with endless waves of enemies that never give in.

When you defeat enemies they drop diamonds, which you can exchange for upgrades to face the final boss in the last room.
You can only win if you use the power of upgrades and skills, because otherwise you will be overwhelmed!

And remember, once you die you have to start all over again! So be on your guard!


Fight with different chasers who have unique abilities that help you chase.

And the best: After each round you win, you will receive a chest with great loot!

Features:
- Random and unique effects that occur every 30 seconds. Will they help you, or will they hinder you?
- Simple controls with just one finger allows for a barrier-free experience
- Earn coins and gems to use for a Chaser upgrade. Level up and increase your stats
descriptionShort: An auto shooting Rouglite Hero RPG game with random dungeons and cartoon style

- The rooms are now no longer arranged randomly but linearly one after the other
- New enemies who now hold the keys must be defeated to get the keys
- Difficulty slightly increased

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
🎉 **What's New!** 🎉
- 🚫 No More Boo-Boos! We've kicked out a sneaky bug that let players get hurt by things you can't even see! 🙈
- 👾 More Baddies! Get ready for extra fun as we've added loads of new enemies to make your adventure even more thrilling! 🌟
- 💥 Power Up! Your skills are now always on and ready to go! Everyone can use their cool moves all the time! 💪
- 🚀 Faster & Smoother! We've made the game better and quicker, so your fun never has to slow down! ✨

title:
Chest Chaser: Dungeon Hero
0.7.122
